patthana8.15:4.1: Nasāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.15:4.2: Nasāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.15:4.3: Nasāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasāsavo ca naanāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.15:5.1: Naanāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana8.15:6.1: Nasāsavañca naanāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.15:7.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … avigate pañca.
